scripts.start: pm2 start ragemp-server --name rage_server && cd ./vue_server && pm2 start "npm run serve" --name rage_vue && pm2 monit
scripts.restart: pm2 stop rage_server && pm2 stop rage_vue && pm2 start ragemp-server --name rage_server && cd ./vue_server && pm2 start "npm run serve" --name rage_vue && pm2 monit
scripts.kill: pm2 stop rage_server && pm2 stop rage_vue && pm2 delete rage_server && pm2 delete rage_vue
scripts.pull: git pull && npm run kill && npm run start
